page.title: 14SCHOOLS IN S.CROYDON
page.content:
There are many schools in the area, ranging from tihy kindergartens to a large secondary school.Some are maintained by the London Borough of Croydon, and others are independently owned.Whitgift is one of the richest private schools in England.It owns a large part of Croydon's Whitgift Centre and receives money from the rent of shops in the shopping centre.
The earliest age children can start school is three and a half, and they can stay until they are eighteen and a half.Many subjects are taught including various technical skills,home economics and computer technology.All school have a uniform although only the independent schools can insist on it being worn.
